## Description

Show Spatial Grids


## Usage

```r
showGrids(...)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |      Arguments passed on to [`showGiottoSpatGrids`](#showgiottospatgrids)   list("\n", "    ", list(list(list("gobject")), list("giotto object")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("nrows")), list("number of rows to print")), "\n", "  ")
